Question
========
Time dilation means that

Answerlist
----------
* moving clocks run slower than clocks at rest.
* moving clocks run faster than clocks at rest.
* moving clocks run at the same rate as clocks at rest.
* time flies when you're having fun.

Solution
========
Time dilation is the effect that moving clocks run slower than clocks at rest.
